title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog UI suggestions
description:
Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

When clicking 'Add' for the associated editors:

a. Enable multiple selection
b. Do not enable 'OK' if no selection is made
c. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as '(default)' (similar to perspectives)

g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

Additional notes:

KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. The dialog needs a width hint

I currently have fixes for a, c, f

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, g
OB: No selection should enable the 'OK' button.

When clicking 'Add', the 'OK' button remains disabled if no selection is made.
d. Existing entries in the associated editors should not be available for selection
